name: Shailesh Parmar
bio: Hi, I'm Shailesh Parmar, a passionate self-taught developer & a freelance software engineer from India. My passion for software lies in dreaming up ideas and making them come true with elegant interfaces. I take great care of the experience, architecture, and code quality of the things I build. I am also an open-source enthusiast and maintainer. I learned a lot from the open-source community & I love how collaboration & knowledge sharing happened through open-source.

milestones.title: Started Freelancing
milestones.description: Started freelancing and build application with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

milestones.title: Got my first job
milestones.description: Landed my first job as Frontend Developer.

milestones.title: Promoted to Software Engineer
milestones.description: I have been promoted to Software Engineer role.
